mapper.select: select * from s where dept = #{dept} and lesson = #{lesson};
select b.sno,b.sname,b.sex,b.age,b.dept,b.leeson from sc a,s b where a.sno = b.sno and a.cno=#{cno} and a.grade < 60;
select count(*) from s a inner join sc b on a.sno = b.sno where a.dept=#{dept} and a.lesson=#{lesson} and b.cno=#{cno} and grade < 60;
select count(*) from s where dept=#{dept} and lesson=#{lesson};

select number from (select CASE WHEN grade >= 90 THEN 'A' WHEN grade >= 80 THEN 'B' WHEN grade >= 70 THEN 'C' WHEN grade >= 60 THEN 'D' ELSE 'F' END AS grade_segment,count(*) number FROM ( select b.grade from (select * from s where dept=#{dept} and lesson=#{lesson}) a inner join (select * from sc where cno=#{cno}) b on a.sno = b.sno) message GROUP BY grade_segment) numbertable where grade_segment = #{grade_segment};
